about_description: Our Arecanut Disease Detection System is an AI-powered web platform designed to assist farmers, researchers, and agricultural experts in identifying and managing diseases affecting arecanut crops.
feature_1_desc: Upload images of arecanut plants and get instant disease identification using our AI model.
feature_2_desc: Get recommended pesticides, fungicides, and preventive measures based on the identified disease.
feature_3_desc: Development of a Smart Hat integrated with a camera to detect arecanut diseases.
feature_4_desc: Explore a static gallery of common arecanut diseases and learn how to recognize and treat them.
carousel_1_desc: Discover how to optimize crop protection and yield with advanced AI-based diagnostics.
carousel_2_desc: Use a smart wearable or your mobile to capture plant symptoms for real-time diagnosis.
carousel_3_desc: Upload images of arecanut plants and get expert treatment suggestions instantly.

disease3_treatment: Scrape the affected area and apply Bordeaux paste or coal tar.

recommendation.title: Yellow Leaf Disease â€“ Recommendation
recommendation.description: Yellow Leaf Disease is a major issue in arecanut, often caused by fungal infections and nutrient deficiencies (mainly potassium and magnesium). Leaves turn yellow prematurely, reducing yield and weakening the tree if untreated.

urea.title: Urea (Nitrogen Fertilizer)
urea.description: Apply 50g per palm once a month to improve leaf greenness and overall plant vigor.

potassium.title: Potassium Sulfate (K2SO4)
potassium.description: Apply 25g per plant monthly to correct potassium deficiency and strengthen leaves.

magnesium.title: Magnesium Sulfate (Epsom Salt)
magnesium.description: Dissolve 20g in 1L water and spray on leaves every 15 days to correct magnesium deficiency.

neem.title: Neem Extract (Bio-fungicide)
neem.description: Spray 3â€“5 ml per liter water as preventive during rainy season.

micronutrient.title: Micronutrient Mix
micronutrient.description: Apply near root zone to correct minor deficiencies (Fe, Zn, Mn) which support leaf health.

npk.title: Balanced NPK Fertilizer
npk.description: Use 50g per plant monthly to maintain overall nutrition balance and support recovery from Yellow Leaf.

card1.title: Tricyclazole 75% WP
card1.desc: Mix 2g in 1L of water and spray around the stem once every 15 days.

card2.title: Copper Oxychloride
card2.desc: Apply 3g in 1L water. Use brush or sprayer to treat the affected stem.

card3.title: Bordeaux Paste
card3.desc: Apply directly to the infected area once every week.

card4.title: Trichoderma viride
card4.desc: Mix in FYM and apply near roots monthly.

card5.title: Neem Cake
card5.desc: Use 250g per plant twice a year to prevent recurrence.

card6.title: Fungicide Mix Combo
card6.desc: Use as per label. Suitable for broad treatment.

fruit_rot.title: Fruit Rot Disease â€“ Recommendation
fruit_rot.description2: It causes rotting and premature dropping of arecanut fruits, especially during the monsoon. Early treatment can prevent heavy losses.

card1.title: Bordeaux Mixture (1%)
card1.desc: Spray 1% Bordeaux mixture on bunches and crown region before and during monsoon.

card2.title: Metalaxyl + Mancozeb (Ridomil Gold)
card2.desc: Mix 2.5g per liter of water and spray on bunches every 25 days during monsoon.

card3.title: Phosphorus Acid 40%
card3.desc: Drench the soil around roots (10 ml/L water) to protect from root infection.

card4.title: Trichoderma harzianum
card4.desc: Mix with FYM and apply near roots at onset of monsoon.

card6.title: Mancozeb 75% WP
